title: UDIRC drone
description:
It’s used to control UDIRC’s drones to fly, take photo, record video, and share to the social network etc. It’s featured with easy control but with various functions.
Main Functions:
1.Real time transmission to experience first person view
2.Gravity induction mode, to control the flight direction with great fun
3.Good media management system, to record the wonderful moment of life
4.HD image and video
